description: Bandit Config Generator - This tool is used to generate an optional profile. The profile may be used to include or skip tests and override values for plugins.

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --show-defaults
options.description: show the default settings values for each plugin but do not output a profile

options.name: --tests
options.description: list of test names to run

options.name: --skip
options.description: list of test names to skip
